post_title: FS: T206 Old Mill Ames Portrait SGC "4" [SOLD}
post_content:
Available for sale is a SGC Graded "4" Old Mill Red Ames Portrait.  Heritage Auctions sold a "4.5" in their weekly Sunday auction on 8.27.2023 for a total cost of $690.  

The asking price for my card is SOLD (add $10 S&H).  

If you want to purchase this card:

1. The first person to reply "I'll take it" will get the card.  This reply will take priority over anyone who may be making inquiries.
2. Send your payment to my PayPal account at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url].
3. Send me your name and address in a private Net54 message or to my email at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url].
4. Please allow up to 5 business days for me to ship the card.
That’s a nice looking Ames. I’ll take it.
